messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Digest Number 2246.....sherri..one income
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 08/15/2002 11:22:56 AM Eastern Daylight Time, ... Sherrie, In addition to all the great resources given, I recommend The Tightwad Gazette.
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 08/15/2002 11:22:56 AM Eastern Daylight Time,
lurningathome@... writes:


> n a message dated 8/14/2002 4:22:12 PM Central Daylight Time,
> Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com writes:
>
>
> > This is a scary experience. I'm not
> > sure that we can financially survive on just one income.

Sherrie,
In addition to all the great resources given, I recommend The Tightwad
Gazette. It's a compilation of a newsletter printed in the 90s. Available
through Amazon.com I've gotten many ideas of ways to save money from this
book.

Ginny


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]

messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Digest Number 2246.....sherri..one income
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 8/14/2002 4:22:12 PM Central Daylight Time, ... Sherrie..... We have had one income since we got married.........and we have been together
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 8/14/2002 4:22:12 PM Central Daylight Time,
Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com writes:


> This is a scary experience. I'm not
> sure that we can financially survive on just one income.

Sherrie.....

We have had one income since we got married.........and we have been
together for almost 20 years and we have 7 kids.
It's tough, but worth it.
There are alot of things out there.
There is so much commercialism and it makes you feel that you need everything
that is thrown at you.
Once you take yourself out of it.......you feel better.
The groups that I belong to;
miserly moms, frugal moms, one income, budget stretcher, and I think there
are others but can't put my finger on it at the moment.
There are all part of yahoogropups.
Here are some sites for you too.........

<A HREF="http://aolsearch.aol.com/redir.adp?appname=MS&query=one%2dincome&url=http%3a%2f%2fwww%2esuite101%2ecom%2fwelcome%2ecfm%2fone%5fincome%5ffamilies&datasource=Google&partner=Google&clickedItemRank=1&requestId=cns44153&component=websearch.google.http.tcl&searchType=MS">One Income Families - Suite101.com</A> - ...
